name: Demon Dinner Date
description:
THE WAIT IS FINALLY OVER! DEMON DINNER DATE IS HERE!

Not really a date, but certainly a dinner!

In this short, silly game you are Daniel Bryan, and you are trying to have a somewhat peaceful dinner with your new tag team partner Kane, but he's... a little hard to deal with. Can you get all the way into dessert, or is he just going to storm off and leave you to eat alone???

Edit: corrected a few typos/grammar mistakes (please let me know if you find any!)

CHECK OUT THESE COOL FEATURES:

  • ART ASSETS MADE FROM SCRATCH!
  • THREE ENDINGS (BAD, GOOD AND BEST)!
  • WRESTLING SUPERSTARS!
  • AWKWARD CONVERSATIONS!
  • CUTENESS!
  • COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY!

Made with TyranoBuilder, with music from HMix and SensesCircuit. Made for the No-Brainer IF Jam, using the following challenges: Use 3 colors or less with all assets; Create ALL art assets from scratch; Include 3 or more endings.
